verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We're not without hope, Not without hope,
Not without joy, Not without power,
Not without faith, Not without grace,
Not without strength To finish the race;
We're not without help, Our help is the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We shall not all sleep, But we shall be changed;
In a moment, In the twinkling of an eye,
The last trumpet shall sound, And the dead shall be raised,
Incorruptible,
And death, and the grave, Are swallowed in victory,
And God, yes our God, Shall fi ll all in all.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Though there be battles, Though there be loss,
We're not afraid, We've counted the cost.
With the armor of God - To the right and the left,
Our captain is Christ, Our enemy death,
And the saints of all time, Are cheering us on.
